Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Figainin 2PL (XXA; UCLL1c; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretions, the banana tree dwelling frog,Boana platanera(Hylidae; Hylinae), Trinidad, South America

Literature Information.Literature:
Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (67.86%) tofrog Figainin 2L=K: 14%; T: 11%. GRAVY: 0.432; mol Wt: 2998.725; mol formula: C137H238N34O35S2; mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against E. coli DSM 787 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), S. aureus
ATCC 43300 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml),  S. epidermidis DSM 28319 (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa DSM 50071 (MIC 100 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC BAA 1705 (MIC 25 ug/ml), A. baumannii DSM 30008 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml),  E. faecalis MF 06036 (MIC 50 ug/ml), E. faecium NCTC 12201 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), C. difficile R20291 or 630 BAA1382 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml).affected multiple Cancer cells A549, MDA-MB-231, HT-29: LC50 6.4-19.2 ug/ml similar to non-cancer cells.Toxicity: murine RBC (HC50 157 uM), low hemo.lytic.
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Sridhar A, Khan D, Cunning TS, Delaney JJ, Taggart MG, Ternan NG, Leprince J, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Attoub S, Mechkarska M. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Multifunctional host-defense peptides isolated from skin secretions of the banana tree dwelling frog Boana platanera (Hylidae; Hylinae).
